name: One Night With The Dude
description:
This fan-game, keep in mind, is in Early Access. There may be bugs and/or certain things changed in the final release.

Your goal is to do 30 task while fending off The Dude, who appears randomly within the vents (watch out for your door power!). You must close the door for a minimum of three seconds, otherwise you’ll probably still die.

Good luck..!
